title: Tell me again why summoner spells are locked behind levels?
body:
The fact you're locking flash, a summoner spell that is seen in 99.99% of games, behind a pathetic level for new accounts is bullcrap.

I can deal with versing people with masteries, but having to use trash ghost while the entire enemy team has flash is a tad unfair, seeing as flash is pretty much a requirement for some champions. Versing someone with flash ignite pretty much gives them an instant advantage in laning, no matter how good they are.

Everything should be available at level one. Better yet, let us buy a boost to level 30.

Leveling with new players is tedious because stomping new players. Is. Not. Fun. I vastly enjoy going 20/2 every game because joyful. I also love being locked to certain roles because SMITE IS LOCKED BEHIND LEVEL PROGRESSION!

LEAGUE OF LEGENDS IS NOT AN MMORPG! WHY ARE YOU TREATING IT LIKE ONE?

I AM ABSOLUTELY INFURIATED.
